name: visualian-website
description: Website single-page modern dan profesional untuk perusahaan teknologi Visualian

scripts.dev: npx concurrently 'npx live-server --port=5500 --host=localhost' 'npx postcss css/tailwind.src.css -o css/tailwind.css --watch'
scripts.build: npx postcss css/tailwind.src.css -o css/tailwind.css && npm run optimize
scripts.optimize: npm run optimize:images && npm run optimize:css && npm run optimize:js
scripts.optimize:images: echo 'Optimize images manually or use imagemin-cli'
scripts.optimize:css: npx postcss css/app.css -o css/app.min.css -u cssnano && npx postcss css/tailwind.css -o css/tailwind.min.css -u cssnano
scripts.build:prod: npx postcss css/tailwind.src.css -o css/tailwind.css && npx postcss css/tailwind.css -o css/tailwind.min.css -u cssnano && npx postcss css/app.css -o css/app.min.css -u cssnano && npx terser js/script.js -o js/script.min.js --source-map
scripts.test: npm run validate && npm run lighthouse

author: Visualian Team
